answers.answer: They talked like 9 oz was good. Does it sound good to you. Do you know what you are having
my baby is a big boy when I was 19 weeks at my ultrasound he was almost 13 oz.
9oz is great!!! Cause my tech told me 8oz was great :)....its nothing to worry about you have a healthy baby in there! And yes I'm having a little girl.  Due next month
Mine was 13 oz too measuring at 22 weeks at 19But they are testing me.early for gestational diabetes due to his size
At my 20 wk ultrasound my baby girl was 10 oz I think urs sounds like a healthy weight too
My little girl at my 17w6d ultrasound was measuring 10ozs :)
Well congrats to all of our healthy babies. I am so glad she is healthy. They did say her head is measuring 5 days smaller. But they say that it is okay.
My baby is a big boy.. when I was 18 weeks he measured 11oz... I'm 29+4 now and he's getting big. lol
At 19 weeks my daughter was 11 ounces. Im 35 weeks now.
@20 weeks my baby boy was 12 oz... your baby be fine hun:)
Thank you all. I am just so worried about her being healthy. Which they said she was so i guess i can calm down.
my boy was 1lb 8oz at a 22wk scan....... is that big?? now im paranoid lol

question: I went for my ultrasound i am 19 weeks an baby weighs 9 oz. How much did your babies weigh?
title: how much should your baby weigh at the 19 weeks ultrasound?
